verbs.description: US President Donald Trump [V: is] expected to come to Britain for several days this summer - and may stay at Balmoral in what will be a major boost to relations between London and Washington
US President Donald Trump is [V: expected] [ARG1: to come to Britain for several days this summer] - and may stay at Balmoral in what will be a major boost to relations between London and Washington

[ARG1: US President Donald Trump] is expected to [V: come] [ARG4: to Britain] [ARGM-TMP: for several days this summer] - and may stay at Balmoral in what will be a major boost to relations between London and Washington
US President Donald Trump is expected to come to Britain for several days this summer - and [V: may] stay at Balmoral in what will be a major boost to relations between London and Washington

[ARG1: US President Donald Trump] is expected to come to Britain for several days this summer - and [ARGM-MOD: may] [V: stay] [ARGM-LOC: at Balmoral] [ARGM-ADV: in what will be a major boost to relations between London and Washington]
US President Donald Trump is expected to come to Britain for several days this summer - and may stay at Balmoral in what [V: will] be a major boost to relations between London and Washington

US President Donald Trump is expected to come to Britain for several days this summer - and may stay at Balmoral in [ARG1: what] [ARGM-MOD: will] [V: be] [ARG2: a major boost to relations between London and Washington]
